permissions: User must be an admin or be permitted to update the related key result (via KeyResultPolicy#update?).
side_effects: Updates the related key result status to scrapped and records the status change comment and changed_by user.
validation_notes: --key-result is required and must refer to an existing key result. The key result current status must be one of: unknown, not_started, red, yellow, green. The key result must be valid or the action fails with validation errors.

flags.name: --key-result
flags.validation: Required. Must identify an existing key result.
